analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Book of Conditional Relations in Reverse Order

original: 23.51. Sanidassanattika, Parittārammaṇattika🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naparittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: sa ni dassana ttika paritta ārammaṇa ttika  na sanidassana sappaṭigham na paritta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ paritta ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: The Book of Conditional Relations in Brief🔽With object visible and with object limited …🔽With object not visible and with object great …

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ namahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naappamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na mahaggata ārammaṇam dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ mahaggata ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi 🔽na sanidassana sappaṭigham na appamāṇa ārammaṇam dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ appamāṇa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With object not visible and with object measureless …
